backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with access control, data models for hotels, tickets, bundles, comparisons, and user profiles, plus profile query logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists human‑written summaries of various frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with SignIn as the index route and wraps the app in theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity and navigates to profile after sign‑in.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnauthSignI: Displays a branded sign‑in screen with logo, welcome text, and a button triggering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/groups/ChatPanel: Renders a chat UI with message list, auto‑scrolling, input box, and send handling with Enter support.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with top nav and footer and sets the document title based on routing and branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays footer with branding, current year, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Provides top navigation with branding, route buttons, user profile access, and a mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoGrid: Shows a grid of photos with hover actions for tagging and deletion, and opens a tag panel when selected.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoUplo: Handles photo uploads with progress tracking, validation, and mutation-based upload flow.
frontend/src/components/memory/TagPeople: Dialog for adding, removing, and saving manual tags on a photo using friends or principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/offers/HotelOffe: UI component for adding, editing, and deleting hotel entries with room and price details.
frontend/src/components/offers/TicketOff: Manages creation and modification of ticket options including type, price, and currency.
frontend/src/components/offers/VipOffers: Provides form controls to add, edit, and remove VIP packages with pricing and inclusions.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleCa: Displays a travel bundle's ticket, hotel, VIP details, and total pricing with ranking badges.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleSo: Sort bar allowing users to choose sorting options for bundles such as price or hotel rating.
frontend/src/components/safety/PurchaseC: Gates purchase-related UI behind authentication and parental consent checks.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Exports app branding settings including name, tagline, and logo paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, friends, comparisons, groups, and albums.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Formats numeric amounts into localized currency strings using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/lib/localComparisonEngine.t: Generates travel bundles by combining tickets, hotels, rooms, and optional VIP packages with cost calculations.
frontend/src/lib/tripWindow.ts: Computes check‑in and check‑out timestamps based on a concert date and buffer days.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumPage.tsx: Displays an album with its photos, supports uploading photos, and allows deleting the album.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Shows group details, chat messages, and members, and allows posting messages and leaving the group.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Lists user groups, handles group creation with a dialog, and redirects unauthenticated users to sign in.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the marketing homepage with hero content, feature cards, and navigation buttons to start trip building or view saved items.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryFinderPage.tsx: Shows the user's photo albums, supports creating new albums, and redirects unauthenticated users to sign in.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user's profile and saved trip comparisons with delete functionality, requiring sign‑in to access.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Generates and displays sorted trip bundle results, with options to save comparisons and navigate back to the trip builder.
Displays saved user comparisons with loading, empty, and authenticated states, and supports deleting comparisons.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Redirects authenticated users to their profile and otherwise shows the unauthenticated sign-in screen.
frontend/src/pages/TripBuilderPage.tsx: Provides a form for building a concert trip with event details and offer editors, then navigates to results for comparison.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, custom animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the concert‑travel app.
